full_summary:
# W6369-20P5MX–7 Comm Gp 1st to 4th line support

## Solicitation Details
### Solicitation Number: WS3898994703
### Solicitation Issue Date: March 6, 2023
### Tender Closing Date: April 24, 2023, 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time
### Amendment Date: April 19, 2023

## Solicitation Overview
This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to the Department of National Defence (DND). The services include 1st to 4th line support for the 7 Communications Group. The proposed contract will be a three-year agreement, with the option to extend for an additional two years.

## Eligibility
To be eligible to respond, bidders must hold a Standing Offer (SO) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) for Tier 2 in all required resource categories. The contract is intended for the National Capital Region.

## Solicitation Method
This solicitation is being issued through the Ariba Discovery platform and the CanadaBuys website.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact Kelly, James, at James.kelly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Important Notes

* The closing time for bid submission has been amended to April 24, 2023, 14:00:00 EDT.
* Bids submitted after the specified time will be considered non-responsive.
* Only TBIPS SA holders meeting the eligibility criteria may submit a bid.

Please ensure that you have a clear understanding of the solicitation requirements and bid submission process before responding to this RFP. 

 FAQs and additional information are provided on the Ariba Discovery platform and the CanadaBuys website. The complete solicitation document may be downloaded from this website.  Address any inquiries to Kelly, James at james.kelly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
